originalText.text:
When we got a flat tire during a crazy rain storm, we immediately called AAA. But, no towing services were available or willing to come out in the horrible weather…until First Star Towing.
Wish we had tried them first! Professional, efficient and very easy to work with - will definitely keep their number close! Highly recommend.

text.text:
When we got a flat tire during a crazy rain storm, we immediately called AAA. But, no towing services were available or willing to come out in the horrible weather…until First Star Towing.
Wish we had tried them first! Professional, efficient and very easy to work with - will definitely keep their number close! Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
I called these company to remove a car blocking my driveway. The dispatch who spoke to me while half asleep told me right away--45 minutes later the truck arrived. The driver immediately had an attitude so I kept calm and allowed him to take the vehicle. He walked around the car for several minutes, jumped back in his truck backed up and paused for several more minutes. It's now midnight. I went over and asked him what's happening and he got an attitude again just tell me he can't do tow it with that truck so another driver was dispatched. I'm upset now but kept calm. I asked him how along will it take the driver to get here and he started arguing with me and blatantly told me I can cancel the service if I want. What kind of a horse's head doing business would behave like that?!

Well, I did call and cancel the service altogether. He seem to have thought I was desperate to park in my driveway so I'd endure the abused, but not I. I would most definitely NOT AT ALL recommend this service to anyone. I even felt bad for the person who's car was going to be towed for possibly having to deal with this company. I'd rather the car stay in the driveway. The ticket should be enough for them to learn their lesson.

DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE! VERY BAD!

originalText.text: Driver was professional and courteous upon arrival.  Once I made contact with them, they were out to me within 30 minutes and quickly took care of getting me and my vehicle where we needed to go.  Pleasant experience and will use again!

text.text: Driver was professional and courteous upon arrival.  Once I made contact with them, they were out to me within 30 minutes and quickly took care of getting me and my vehicle where we needed to go.  Pleasant experience and will use again!

originalText.text: I got stuck in jacobi hospital in Bronx NY. I call this towing , they said will be there in 15 min . I wait almost 3 hours , nobody show up , keep giving excuse for 15 mins. Then they stop answering your calls too. This is worst towing company I ever seen in my life .

text.text: I got stuck in jacobi hospital in Bronx NY. I call this towing , they said will be there in 15 min . I wait almost 3 hours , nobody show up , keep giving excuse for 15 mins. Then they stop answering your calls too. This is worst towing company I ever seen in my life .

originalText.text: This is the worst place to deal with. Please please do not do business with them you will regret it. They are liars and very unprofessional. On the phone they told me I can use credit card and gave me a price for towing, once they tow the car to the place I wanted to tow they told me Cash only or we will take the car back to our shop until you pay and the price they told me on the phone now was higher then what they 1st told me. STAY AWAY FROM THESE SCUMS
